name: Carvenhold_Prototipe
description:
ONLY PLAYABLE WITH A  CONTROLLER

This is our final project made in Unity. We made it in a month between two programers and a game designer/ artist.

This is a 3D platformer in which you can jump up two 4 times in a row.

You play as Aurora. While investigating a mysterious door that appeared in her home.

There are secrets stories and collectibles scattered around the levels.

Keep a look for the eyes.

In total there are 5 hidden hearts.

To enter the menu press start.

We hope you enjoy

Game designer/artist: Víctor Cristóbal

Unity Programmer: Enrico Momo

Unity Programmer: Adam Prinz
